languages.text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
languages.original_text: Всякий раз, когда владелец успешно {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от входящей атаки или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} ее, он получает +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the wielder successfully dodges or parries an incoming attack, they gain +10 momentum.
Whenever the wearer successfully dodges or parries an incoming attack, they gain +10 momentum.

Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

languages.text: Всякий раз, когда владелец успешно {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от входящей атаки или {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} ее, он получает +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментума{/g}.
Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque, gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador esquiva o para un ataque, gana +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g}.

languages.text: 每当装备者成功{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，都会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者成功闪避或招架攻击时，都会获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}。

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} ou à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} une attaque, il obtient +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que l'utilisateur réussit à esquiver ou à parer une attaque, il obtient +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger einem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g} oder ihn {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g} kann, erhält er +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger einem eingehenden Angriff ausweicht oder ihn parieren kann, erlangt er +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が自分への攻撃を上手く{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}た場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}+10を獲得する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 使用者が自分への攻撃を上手く回避または受け流した場合、{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g} +10を獲得する。

languages.text: Takan kişi, gelen saldırıya karşı başarılı bir {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} yaptığında +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazanır.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer successfully {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an incoming attack, they gain +10 {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}.
